Cases

Case-1 The tumor is present in the left frontal lobe and nearby corticospinal tract. Fiber bundle obtained from original tensor volume by using 1) deterministic fiber tracking and 2) a 150 variations of the same bundle based on uncertainty simulation. Selection can be made to visualize fiber tracts with and without uncertainty information. Sliders can be used to manipulate the anatomical slices.

Without uncertainty

With uncertainty (100%)
